titleStmt.title: The articles of agreement between the Lord Generall, and the Kentish-men, at the delivering up of the city of Canterburie: a letter from York; and the storming of Pembroke by Lieutenant-generall Cromwell, and the successe thereof.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
